name: Upiór
startIntroPart1: Thirsty for new adventures, my liege?
startIntroPart2: This is a nation of ancient bloodsucking beings, old and powerful, and a tiny bit disconnected of the affairs of mere mortals
declaringWar: Nothing to be worried about, this will be over soon
attacked: I suppose we'll have to ready the peasants to fight
defeated: You may have caused us a temporary setback, we will come back to haunt you another time
neutralNo: Am I supposed to answer this?
neutralYes: Well then, let's see you get to it.
Deal concluded, you may be on your way.
hateYes: You're lucky I'm not thirsty for more... this time.
afterPeace: We are happy to inform you that we spared your lives... for now.
tradeRequest: Trade is beneath us, but our advisor counsels some kind of exchange.
